Animal rights activists protested against
bullfighting in Mexico City, the capital

vetoed a request to suspend the
fighting activities.  At the Plaza

and lay on the steps of the
Mexican Congress building. One
banner had the words that had more than 31,800
signatures.  bridge to ban bullfighting in Mexico City
